author: Staff Reporter
text:
The R.S. Puram police arrested Selvaraj (38), a car driver, for murdering his friend A. Rafiq (39), a gold jewellery polishing worker, at the latter’s room on Rajendra Prasad street at Seeranaickenpalayam on Sunday. The police said that a wordy argument broke between the two and Selvaraj stabbed his friend on his neck with a broken liquor bottle.

Rafiq was admitted to the Coimbatore Medical College Hospital where he died the same night. Selvaraj was booked under Section 302 (murder) of the Indian Penal Code, arrested and remanded.
title: Man held for murdering friend
